item.title: Make a Personal Website with blogdown
item.description: In this post, I am going to cover the basics to create a website using blogdown and Hugo. We will create and deploy a template website as well as cover some basics about changing content. You should be extremely comfortable coding in R and working with R Markdown and have a working knowledge of GitHub. Useful Resources Before going through the instructions Iâ€™ve included some resources that I found really useful.
